title: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Forest Park Police Department)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Vehicle Pursuit Dashcam video and body camera (Forest Park Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of dashcam and or bodycam video of police pursuits from 01/02/2021 to 01/02/2024.  I would like vehicle and foot pursuits.  Please include an abbreviated processing note for each video

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael Faulkner

communications.subject: Records Request Confirmation
communications.communication:
Thank you for submitting a request for records.

Your requested security key is 172737. 
  
 Your request reference number is Request Number: PD-143-2024.

Please have this security key and reference number available when communicating with our staff regarding your request. 
  
   
  
 Thank you, 
  
 City of Forest Park

Note: This is an automated email notification. Please don't reply to this email.

communications.subject: Records request received
communications.communication:
Good Morning 
  
 You've reached the City of Forest Park Police Department. Your request for records has been received and is being processed. Please allow 3-5 business days to respond. If we require additional time to compile the reports, we will notify you at our earliest convenience. 
  
 
Thank you

communications.subject: More information
communications.communication:
Good morning, 
  
 I am confirming the dates you are requesting is 01/02/2021 to 01/02/2024. That will be 4 years of body cam and dashcam. Can you please give me a detail location or time of the event. I will need it to be more specific in detail. 
  
 Thank you.
